title: Adobe Total Training Creative Suite 2 Standard Edition Bundle
description:
Creative Suite 2 Premium Bundle:

Expand your creative potential with Total Training?s Adobe
Creative Suite 2 Standard Edition Bundle. You?ll uncover
valuable tips and techniques to sharpen your skills for
Adobe Photoshop CS2, InDesign CS2 and Illustrator CS2. Adobe
industry experts, Deke McClelland and Steve Holmes lead you
through valuable lessons to enhance your entire creative
print and web process, and share time-saving techniques.
Included with each training series, are project files to
help you learn along the way and at your own pace.

Included In The Bundle:

- Total Training For Adobe Acrobat 7 Professional
- Total Training Presents: Adobe Creative Suite 2 ? From Design To Delivery
- Total Training For Adobe Illustrator CS2
- Total Training For Adobe InDesign CS2
- Total Training For Adobe GoLive CS2
- Total Training For Adobe Photoshop CS2

FREE Gifts With This Bundle:

- Total Training Presents: QuarkXpress To Adobe InDesign CS - Making The Switch
- Total Training Presents: Tips & Tricks For Adobe Photoshop

BONUS:

- Total Training Presents: Adobe Creative Suite 2 ? From Design To Delivery Workflow Checklist (PDF)
- MenuMachine 1.74 For Adobe GoLive CS2
- SportivoBold Font For Adobe InDesign CS2
